patch.description:
- a payments is stored for a **specific session** so the the given amount must correspond to a per session amount .
- if the group price is **80** : after student pays for (**4** attendances) **changing** the paid price to **100** requires hitting this endpoint **4** time with **amountPerSession**25** and the proper **attendanceId** each time.

get.description: get user with his roles can be used for logs

post.description: sets the attendances for a session ; body.attendances should cover all students in the session ( group ) otherwise an error is thrown ; calling this endpoint deletes all existing attendacnes rows for the given session(if they exist) and adds the given ones

patch.description: switch a student from a group to another group ; student must be already enrolled in oldGroup
